page.title: 02Fishing in Fraserburgh
page.content: Fishing is a very popular job.Fishing can be dangerous when the sea is rough.A boat can carry 1000 fish or if it is a big boat it can carry more. There are about 7-8 crew in a boat and the longest a boat usually goes away for is 8-10 days.Boats that are fishing can fish until they are 3 miles from Fraserburgh.When you are fishing beside Norway you can fish until you are 15 miles from there.Fraserburgh fish stocks are dwindling so some boats will be going elsewhere.Boats have automatic pilots.There are three kinds of fishing;purse,seine and trawl.When you trawl you use otter boards.To purse you shoot the net,circle round it and when the net is in a circle you haul it in.To seine you shoot the ropes instead of the otter boards.
